post.body: I need to help you get more css and design skillz. Good thing your coming out to visit. I just finished repairing a board 4u
I think beth and I are, bit of a hike though
That is great.
the weather on this side of the hill is even wackier
Looking forward to coming out? What did your parents say when you informed them you bought a ticket to Cali at 2 am?
Its for a former employer so its a system I know well. I just shudder at looking at code I wrote over 5 years ago.
I have a rule, Mac's for Laptops, PC's for Desktops. Mac's you can't really upgrade so works best as a laptop, PC truely custom.
Great seesion at the Jetty with @surfergrrrl. I lost count after 10 waves! Great fun on the short board. All other boards now repaired WOOT!
Heading out to the jetty for surfing at 12:00, the swell looks small but fun.
LEFT 4 DEAD is 25% off from steam! Get the best zombie game ever made for $37.49! If you get it let me know and we will play!
Sitting in the parking lot in hmb after an awesome 2 hour session at the jetty. Had to make up for not surfing for 3 days
Looks like the Jetty is going to be lots of fun today with 4-5 swell and a late day low tide. http://tinyurl.com/78erx8
Watching the waves in pacfica. They are huge!!
Its nice and sunny this morning, too bad the surf is Huge and blown out :( May try for something later in the afternoon if it cleans up.
Finishing up at in n out burger. Christmas surfing plans foiled by massive swell. Surf doesn't look good until Saturday :(
About to celebrete Xmas eve with a new tradition. In N out burger!!
I want one, anyone have a spare $139,000? http://tinyurl.com/9nkm6g
Its raining and windy so no surfing today. Specing out PHP project.
Woot! Just landed a quick freelance PHP project. I will be holding my nose while I do it, but desperate times call for desperate languages.
Morning surf completed on shortboard. Tired, cold but totally stoked. Bed looks like a nice warm place to spend time til next session at 4pm
